Sentencas: (YCa)(TiMn)O3- ceramics prepared using a reaction-sintering process were investigated.
Titulo: Preparation and Properties of (YCa)(TiMn)O3-δ Ceramics Interconnect of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Without any calcination involved, the mixture of raw materials was pressed and sintered directly.
Titulo: Preparation and Properties of (YCa)(TiMn)O3-δ Ceramics Interconnect of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Y2Ti2O7 instead of YTiO3 formed when a mixture of Y2O3 and TiO2 with Y/Ti ratio 1/1 were sintered in air.
Titulo: Preparation and Properties of (YCa)(TiMn)O3-δ Ceramics Interconnect of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Y2Ti2O7, YTiO2.085 and some unknown phases were detected in Y0.6Ca0.4Ti0.6Mn0.4O3-.
Titulo: Preparation and Properties of (YCa)(TiMn)O3-δ Ceramics Interconnect of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Monophasic Y0.6Ca0.4Ti0.4Mn0.6O3- ceramics were obtained after 1400-1500 degrees C sintering.
Titulo: Preparation and Properties of (YCa)(TiMn)O3-δ Ceramics Interconnect of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Dense Y0.6Ca0.4Ti0.4Mn0.6O3- with a density 4.69 g/cm(3) was observed after 1500 degrees C/4 h sintering.
Titulo: Preparation and Properties of (YCa)(TiMn)O3-δ Ceramics Interconnect of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Log sigma for Y0.6Ca0.4Ti0.6Mn0.4O3- increased from -3.73 Scm(-1) at 350 degrees C to -2.14 Scm(-1) at 700 degrees C. Log sigma for Y0.6Ca0.4Ti0.4Mn0.6O3- increased from -2.1 Scm(-1) at 350 degrees C to -1.36 Scm(-1) at 700 degrees C. Increasing Mn content decreased activation energy E-a and increased electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Preparation and Properties of (YCa)(TiMn)O3-δ Ceramics Interconnect of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Reaction-sintering process is proved to be a simple and effective method to obtain (YCa)(TiMn)O3- ceramics for interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Preparation and Properties of (YCa)(TiMn)O3-δ Ceramics Interconnect of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
